config._comment: Sink configuration for ScreenRant RSS related topics (processed by NLP tasks)
config.neo4j.topic.cypher.screenrant-question-a: MERGE (n:MovieNews {link:event.link, pub_date:event.pub_date}) SET n.mentioned_movie=event.mentioned_movie, n.mentioned_score=event.mentioned_score, n.timestamp_qa=event.timestamp_qa
config.neo4j.topic.cypher.screenrant-text-class: MERGE (n:MovieNews {link:event.link, pub_date:event.pub_date}) SET n.category=event.category, n.content=event.content, n.creator=event.creator, n.description=event.description, n.enclosure_url=event.enclosure_url, n.href_list=apoc.convert.toJson(event.href_list), n.news_label_list=apoc.convert.toJson(event.news_label_list), n.timestamp_tc=event.timestamp_pp, n.title=event.title, n.timestamp_nj=datetime().epochMillis
